body_html:
hi, asslle:

My goal is to use NDK to compile C++ static libraries that can be called by Android. I don't quite understand what you're saying "modify the ops to be driven by the "reference ops" rather than the "optimized ops" to avoid using neon. " PS: I refer to /tensorflow/contrib/lite/makefile

hi, asslle:
My goal is to use NDK to compile C++ static libraries that can be called by Android. I don't quite understand what you're saying "modify the ops to be driven by the "reference ops" rather than the "optimized ops" to avoid using neon. " PS: I refer to /tensorflow/contrib/lite/makefile
body:
hi, asslle:

My goal is to use NDK to compile C++ static libraries that can be called by Android. I don't quite understand what you're saying "modify the ops to be driven by the "reference ops" rather than the "optimized ops" to avoid using neon. " PS: I refer to /tensorflow/contrib/lite/makefile
